scripts.build: sass --quiet src/sass/style.scss public/wp-content/themes/alex/style.css && rsync -vaE --progress src/favicons public/wp-content/themes/alex && rsync -vaE --progress src/fonts public/wp-content/themes/alex && rsync -vaE --progress src/images public/wp-content/themes/alex && rsync -vaE --progress src/js public/wp-content/themes/alex && rsync -vaE --progress src/php/* public/wp-content/themes/alex && rm public/wp-content/themes/alex/style.css.map
